title: Administer
content:
This section describes administration tasks that the IT Administrator and Suite Administer user roles can perform in OPTIC Management ToolkitÂ (OMT) and Service Management Automation (SMA).

  • Set up a tenant
  • Perform ongoing maintenance of the suite
  • Administer Smart Analytics
  • Configure suite in Suite Administration
  • Localize the suite by using OpenL10N
  • Customize the login and logout pages
  • Administer Service Management
  • Administer Operation Orchestration
  • Administer Cloud Management
